articles.author: A. Odysseus Patrick
articles.title: Australia fires intensify as prime minister calls up army reservists to help contain crisis
articles.description: Record temperatures and strong winds fueled the inferno, threatening lives and property over a vast swath of the country.
articles.content:
Horrendous conditions confronted firefighters. Temperatures on Saturday broke records, reaching 120 degrees Fahrenheit on the forest-fringed outskirts of Sydney and 111 degrees in the capital, Canberra, while strong winds fanned the flames.
Houses were explo… [+4376 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Thousands mourn Iranian general killed in US airstrike
articles.description: Thousands of mourners are gathering for a funeral procession through Baghdad for Iran's top general and other militants killed in a U.S. airstrike
articles.content:
Many of the mourners were dressed in black, and they carried Iraqi flags and the flags of Iran-backed militias that are fiercely loyal to Soleimani.
Iran has vowed harsh retaliation, raising fears of an all-out war. U.S. President Donald Trump says he ordere… [+1164 chars]

articles.author: Sopheng Cheang | AP
articles.title: Search in Cambodia resumes after building collapse kills 5
articles.description: Rescuers in Cambodia are working for a second day to see if there are any more survivors from a building collapse that killed at least five people and injured about 20
articles.content: He announced Saturday morning the casualty toll of seven dead and 18 injured, but other tallies were slightly different, and it was not clear why they varied. Kep provincial authorities later announced a total of five dead and 18 injured. Several of the hospi… [+1187 chars]
